chara.textHome: I'm Mel Anna!

The fortune-teller who's NEVER wrong!
Yep, 100% right on the nose!

So, what would you like to know
about the future?!

Ask me anything about today, tomorrow,
or even something that's on your mind
right now!

Oh, just a heads up,
I don't want to hear it if you
don't like your fortune!

It's hard, darn near impossible,
to escape the fortune my tarot cards show!

Just as they showed,
I've gotten stronger, see!

Behold, the time to unleash the darkest
of fates is drawing ever closer!

This boost in magic power means
my fortune-telling became
that much more accurate!

According to my fortune, tonight's dinner
should've been fermented beans,
which I hate...
But it was actually stew, my absolute fav!

Oh, now I get it! I was looking at the card
upside down!

Back when that fortune-telling ban happened,
I thought I wasn't allowed to be ME anymore.

But once I found out my power might be
altering reality based on the results,
I was able to accept it.

Now I'm working on a way to only
get the good readings!

*Giggle*
You came again, huh?

Well, I can hardly blame you for
coming back, my fortunes are
always on the money.

Now, what do you want to know
about your future?
Mornings are nerve-racking...

Today's fortune is all contained here
in these tarot cards...

Will it be good? Or bad?
It's time to find out!

That's the lunch bell.
I'm heading out to the back.

They can forbid me to tell fortunes
at school, but that'll never stop me!
Ah, I was sure you were another customer!

I always get swamped after school doing
readings, so it takes forever to get home!
Hoot... Hoot... Hoot...
Night's when the owls come out...

I want one of my own so bad,
I tried imitating one.
Please forget you heard that.
Eeek! Don't scare me like that!

If this card slid a smidgen to the right,
the whole world could've blown up!
...Just kidding.
I feel some strange magic in the air...
My cards say it's a Witch!
Let's move it! I wanna see if I'm right!

Something imitating us may appear
in this city, perhaps in the near future.

Th-the super hard test, tripping in PE...
it was all in my fortune!
It's not my fault!
Mn... Nnh...
Mnnngh!!!
I want one... I want my own pet owl so bad!

A fortune-teller with an owl perched on
her shoulder. How cool would that be?!

It's hard when everything I predict
comes true.

How can people avoid danger
when I sense bad luck in them?

Career path surveys were passed out
at school for the first time today.

I wrote "fortune-teller", but the teacher
must not've liked it for some reason
'cause she got angry at me...

We're going to have to give it our all...
Tsuruno, Momoko, and I are about to brawl
 it out and see who gets to talk to Yachiyo.
Where do I stand with Yachiyo?

Well, Tsuruno's the apprentice, Momoko's a
burr stuck to her clothes, Mifuyu's the trusty
sidekick, and I'm...the little sister, I guess!

Mifuyu's older than me, but it seems
like she's hopeless around the house.

Putting a positive spin on it, she's
really relaxed. But you can also say
she's kind of sloppy...
Yachiyo can be a real drill sergeant.

But she does everything for a reason,
and I can tell how much she cares about
everyone. So I love her to pieces!

Look at this! Our compatibility has never,
ever been this high before!

It's funny, but now it kinda feels like
our affinity is bubbling over!
I have my cards! They will lead me!

I'm good enough to win without
reading the future!
I knew this was going to happen!
I probably could've handled this by myself.
Even the enemies didn't see THAT coming!

You can't carry on without my predictions,
right?!

What, that's not it?
You just want me to fight alongside you?!
Okay by me!

I'm Mel Anna!
Can't wait to get started!
This is going just as I predicted!

Since I've perfected this style of
fortune-telling, I'm ready to try my
hand at something new!

What luck! If you want to ask me
something, now's the time!
Tarot cards are my bread and butter!

There are so many ways you can
line them up, but I have my own
original spread and mixing method!

The first four tarot cards I draw show me
the past, present situation,
spiritual condition,

and future possibilities of
whoever's fortune I'm telling.

It's the fifth card that tells me if
today's going to be a lucky one!
